Comments: Have been using for about a year and a half. One 17.5 mg injection weekly. Helps with joint pain_ but does not completely make me pain free. Need steroids or another RA medicine in addition. Does not prevent flare-ups but DOES prevent inflammation which leads to deterioration of the joints and deformity which is the greatest thing about this drug and why is extremely important.

Side Effects: No side effects that I know of.  I give myself a 1cc injection weekly.  Some people don't like needles_ but this doesn't bother me.
Comments: It is hard to find the 40ML big bottle.
